beer_brewer_name: The Traveler Beer Company (formerly House Of Shandy)
review_blob: Ignore the beer snobs who give this beer a low rating. This is a good damn beer. Full of flavor, not overbearing. One of the few that go good with practically any meal, too.

I love hefs, and I think this one is among the best. Its the kind of beer that makes your mouth water AFTER you drink it- like orange juice the morning after a long night out. Perfect for outdoor activities where beer is part of the plan. Fishing, beach day, sporting event...Its always a win.

Its light, crisp, and very tasty. Its the kind of beer you can drink on all day and not get sick of it. As a local to the brewery, I can enjoy it on the beach, fishing, or any lengthy outdoor activity, or just sitting at the bar for hours. If its on the menu, I get it.
beer_name: 3 Daughters St. Pete Beach Blonde Ale
